content.rendered:
Our guide to the best house design resources on the internet.

Looking for house design resources? Building your own home can be a daunting prospect; in fact, just knowing where to start is difficult enough. So we’ve trawled the net to find the most useful sources of information when it comes to making your self-build dream a reality (other than houseplansdirect.co.uk of course…)

Tailor-Made Designs Ltd specialise in the design, manufacture and erection of timber frame buildings, houses, homes and kits throughout the UK.

 

Drainwave is a revolutionary system known as the ‘wave in a box’ – providing the opportunity to maximise water savings whilst avoiding the problem of dry drains and blockages.

 

Estimators Limited are the UK’s biggest provider of domestic building estimating services, offering detailed labour and materials estimates that show the true cost of your building project.

 

IG Lintels has over 40 years experience of manufacturing the highest quality building products for house builders and commercial developers.

 

Homebuilding & Renovating is a fantastic resource for articles relating to everything from trends in house design to detailed materials costs, sourcing land to build upon and finding trustworthy contractors.

 

Ads by Google
